Package gov.nasa.worldwind.util.webview

Provides classes for loading web content, laying out and rendering the content as an OpenGL texture, and interacting with the rendered content.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WebResourceResolver  
    WebView
    WebView provides an interface for loading web content, laying out and rendering the content as an OpenGL texture, and interacting with the rendered content.
    WebViewFactory
    Factory interface for creating WebView instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWebView
    Abstract base class for WebView implementations.
    BasicWebViewFactory
    Factory implementation for creating WebView instances.
    MacWebView  
    MacWebViewJNI  
    WebViewTexture  
    WindowsWebView
    WebView implementation for Windows.
    WindowsWebViewJNI
    JNI bindings for the Windows WebView library.

Package gov.nasa.worldwind.util.webview Description

Provides classes for loading web content, laying out and rendering the content as an OpenGL texture, and interacting with the rendered content.

AbstractBrowserBalloon uses WebView to implement a balloon that contains web content. See Balloons for an example of usage.

To use WebView:

  • Create an instance of WebView using WebViewFactory
  • Loading content into the WebView using WebView.setHTMLString(java.lang.String)
  • Load the WebView into an OpenGL texture using WebView.getTextureRepresentation(gov.nasa.worldwind.render.DrawContext)
  • Draw the texture in WorldWind
  • (Optional) Forward user input to the WebView to make the page interactive using WebView.sendEvent(java.awt.event.InputEvent)
